sourcesContent:
<template>
  <swiper
    :cssMode="true"
    style="overflow: hidden !important; height: 100%;"
    :slides-per-view="1"
    :loop="false"
    :mousewheel="true"
    :direction="'horizontal'"
    pagination
  >
    <swiper-slide><promo /></swiper-slide>
    <swiper-slide><genres /></swiper-slide>
  </swiper>
</template>

<script>
import TheSlideGroup from "../components/carousels/TheSlideGroup.vue";
import Lazy from "../components/lazy/Lazy.vue";
import {Swiper, SwiperSlide, SwiperCore} from "swiper-vue2";
import {Mousewheel, Keyboard, Pagination, A11y, EffectFade} from 'swiper';
import 'swiper/swiper.scss';
import Promo from "../components/Promo.vue";
import Genres from "../components/Genres.vue";
SwiperCore.use([Mousewheel, Keyboard, Pagination, A11y, EffectFade]);

export default {
  name: "IndexView",
  components: {Genres, Promo, Lazy, TheSlideGroup, Swiper, SwiperSlide},
  data: () => ({
    pageName: "",
    height: 0,
  }),
  methods: {
    onSwiper (swiper) {
      console.log(swiper)
    },
    onSlideChange () {
      console.log('slide change')
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
